00026 #ifndef CONSOLETABLE_H_
00027 #define CONSOLETABLE_H_
00028 
00029 #define CONSOLE_TABLE_FIELD_NAME_MAXLEN 80
00030 //linePrepend, lineApend, delimiter
00031 #define CONSOLE_TABLE_MAX_SEPARATOR_LEN 10
00032 
00033 #define CONSOLE_TABLE_DEFAULT_COL_DELIMITER "|"
00034 
00035 enum ConsoleTableAlignment
00036 {
00037     CONSOLE_TABLE_ALIGNMENT_LEFT,
00038 //  CONSOLE_TABLE_ALIGNMENT_CENTER,
00039     CONSOLE_TABLE_ALIGNMENT_RIGHT
00040 };
00041 
00042 struct ConsoleTable
00043 {
00044     struct Field
00045     {
00046         unsigned width;
00047         char name[CONSOLE_TABLE_FIELD_NAME_MAXLEN];
00048         enum ConsoleTableAlignment alignment;
00049     }* fields;
00050     char linePrepend[CONSOLE_TABLE_MAX_SEPARATOR_LEN];
00051     char lineAppend[CONSOLE_TABLE_MAX_SEPARATOR_LEN];
00052     char colDelimiter[CONSOLE_TABLE_MAX_SEPARATOR_LEN];
00053     unsigned padding;
00054     unsigned numFields;
00055 };
00056 
00057 typedef struct ConsoleTable ConsoleTableT;
00058 
00059 ConsoleTableT* ConsoleTableCreate();
00060 
00061 int ConsoleTableAddField(ConsoleTableT* tableObj, unsigned width,
00062         const char* name, enum ConsoleTableAlignment alignment);
00063 
00064 void ConsoleTableDelete(ConsoleTableT* tableObj);
00065 
00066 void ConsoleTablePrintHeader(ConsoleTableT* tableObj);
00067 
00068 void ConsoleTableFillCell(ConsoleTableT* tableObj, const char* content);
00069 
00070 void ConsoleTableSetLinePrepend(ConsoleTableT* tableObj, const char* prependstr);
00071 
00072 void ConsoleTableSetLineAppend(ConsoleTableT* tableObj, const char* appendStr);
00073 
00074 void ConsoleTableSetColDelimiter(ConsoleTableT* tableObj, const char* colDelimiterStr);
00075 
00076 void ConsoleTableSetPadding(ConsoleTableT* tableObj, unsigned padding);
00077 
00078 #endif /* CONSOLETABLE_H_ */
